trans-unit.source: Represents a UTF-16 encoding of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Unicode 字符的 UTF-16 编码。

trans-unit.source: Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。

trans-unit.source: Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 解码是一组 Unicode 字符转换为编码字节的序列的过程。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) assigns a code point (a number) to each character in every supported script.
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)将码位 （数字） 分配给每个受支持脚本中的每个字符。

trans-unit.source: A Unicode Transformation Format (UTF) is a way to encode that code point.
trans-unit.target: Unicode 转换格式 (UTF) 是一种方法将码位编码。

trans-unit.source: The [Unicode Standard](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) uses the following UTFs:
trans-unit.target: [Unicode 标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)使用以下 Utf:

trans-unit.source: UTF-8, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes.
trans-unit.target: Utf-8，它将每个码位表示为一至四个字节的序列。

trans-unit.source: UTF-16, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to two 16-bit integers.
trans-unit.target: UTF 16，它将每个码位表示为一到两个 16 位整数的序列。

trans-unit.source: UTF-32, which represents each code point as a 32-bit integer.
trans-unit.target: Utf-32，它将每个码位表示为一个 32 位整数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by <xref:System.Text>, see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Utf 和其他编码支持的详细信息<xref:System.Text>，请参阅[.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> class represents a UTF-16 encoding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>类表示的 utf-16 编码。

trans-unit.source: The encoder can use either big endian byte order (most significant byte first) or little endian byte order (least significant byte first).
trans-unit.target: 编码器可以使用任意 big endian 字节顺序 (最高有效字节第一个) 或 little-endian 字节顺序 (最低有效字节第一个)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the Latin Capital Letter A (code point U+0041) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal):
trans-unit.target: 例如，A （码位 U + 0041） 序列化为拉丁文大写字母 （十六进制） 如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Big endian byte order: 00 00 00 41
trans-unit.target: Big endian 字节顺序： 00 00 00 41

trans-unit.source: Little endian byte order: 41 00 00 00
trans-unit.target: Little-endian 字节顺序： 41 00 00 00

trans-unit.source: It is generally more efficient to store Unicode characters using the native byte order of a particular platform.
trans-unit.target: 它是通常将使用的特定平台的本机字节顺序的 Unicode 字符存储更为有效。

trans-unit.source: For example, it is better to use the little endian byte order on little endian platforms, such as Intel computers.
trans-unit.target: 例如，则最好在小 endian 平台，如 Intel 计算机上使用 little-endian 字节顺序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> class corresponds to the Windows code pages 1200 (little endian byte order) and 1201 (big endian byte order).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>类对应于 1200 （little-endian 字节顺序） 和 1201 （big endian 字节顺序） 的 Windows 代码页。

trans-unit.source: You can determine the "endianness" of a particular architecture by calling the <xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过调用中确定的特定体系结构的"字节排序方式"<xref:System.BitConverter.IsLittleEndian?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object provides a byte order mark (BOM), which is an array of bytes that can be prefixed to the sequence of bytes resulting from the encoding process.
trans-unit.target: （可选）<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象提供字节顺序标记 (BOM)，这是可以作为前缀为的编码的过程中所产生的字节序列的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: If the preamble contains a byte order mark (BOM), it helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format or UTF.
trans-unit.target: 如果该前导码包含字节顺序标记 (BOM)，它可帮助确定的字节顺序和转换格式或 UTF 解码器。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> instance is configured to provide a BOM, you can retrieve it by calling the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method; otherwise, the method returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>实例配置为提供 BOM，你可以通过调用来检索它<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法; 否则，该方法返回空数组。

trans-unit.source: Note that, even if a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object is configured for BOM support, you must include the BOM at the beginning of the encoded byte stream as appropriate; the encoding methods of the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> class do not do this automatically.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，即使<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象已配置了 BOM 支持，必须包括根据; 编码的字节流的开头 BOM 编码方法的<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>类执行不自动执行此操作。

trans-unit.source: To enable error detection and to make the class instance more secure, you should instantiate a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object by calling the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor and setting its `throwOnInvalidBytes` argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要启用错误检测并使类实例更加安全，你应实例化<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象通过调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数，并设置其`throwOnInvalidBytes`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: With error detection, a method that detects an invalid sequence of characters or bytes throws a <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误检测，检测到无效的字符或字节序列的方法引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Without error detection, no exception is thrown, and the invalid sequence is generally ignored.
trans-unit.target: 错误检测，不会引发异常，而无需通常忽略无效的序列。

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object in a number of ways, depending on whether you want to it to provide a byte order mark (BOM), whether you want big-endian or little-endian encoding, and whether you want to enable error detection.
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>多种方式，具体取决于是否要向其提供字节顺序标记 (BOM)、 是否需要 big endian 或小 endian 编码，以及是否想要启用错误检测的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> constructors and the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> properties that return a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>构造函数和<xref:System.Text.Encoding>返回的属性<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method determines how many bytes result in encoding a set of Unicode characters, and the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method performs the actual encoding.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法确定将多少个字节进行编码的一组 Unicode 字符和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法执行实际的编码。

trans-unit.source: Likewise, the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A> method determines how many characters result in decoding a sequence of bytes, and the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A> and <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetString%2A> methods perform the actual decoding.
trans-unit.target: 同样，<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>方法确定有多少个字符的字节序列进行解码所导致和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetString%2A>方法执行实际的解码。

trans-unit.source: For an encoder or decoder that is able to save state information when encoding or decoding data that spans multiple blocks (such as string of 1 million characters that is encoded in 100,000-character segments), use the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> and <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 为编码器或解码器能够保存编码或解码跨多个块 （如在 100,000 字符段中编码的字符串的 100 万个字符） 的数据时的状态信息，请使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>属性，分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to encode a string of Unicode characters into a byte array by using a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何通过使用 Unicode 字符将字符串编码为字节数组<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象。

trans-unit.source: The byte array is decoded into a string to demonstrate that there is no loss of data.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组解码为字符串，以表明有不会丢失数据。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the same string as the previous one, except that it writes the encoded bytes to a file and prefixes the byte stream with a byte order mark (BOM).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用相同的字符串与之前，只不过它将已编码的字节写入文件且前缀字节顺序标记 (BOM) 在字节流。

trans-unit.source: It then reads the file in two different ways: as a text file by using a <xref:System.IO.StreamReader> object; and as a binary file.
trans-unit.target: 它然后两个不同的方式读取文件： 作为通过使用文本文件<xref:System.IO.StreamReader>对象; 和为二进制文件。

trans-unit.source: As you would expect, in neither case is the BOM included in the newly read string.
trans-unit.target: 如你所料，在任何情况下是物料清单中包含新读取的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an instance that uses the little endian byte order, provides a Unicode byte order mark, and does not throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建的实例使用 little-endian 字节顺序，提供 Unicode 字节顺序标记，并当检测到无效的编码时，不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you should enable error detection by calling the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor and setting its `throwOnInvalidBytes` argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，应启用错误检测，通过调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数，并设置其`throwOnInvalidBytes`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> instance and display the name of the encoding.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个新<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>实例，并显示编码的名称。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the big endian byte order (most significant byte first), or <see langword="false" /> to use the little endian byte order (least significant byte first).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则使用 Big-Endian 字节顺序（从最高有效字节开始）；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使用 Little-Endian 字节顺序（从最低有效字节开始）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> method returns a Unicode byte order mark; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则指定 <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> 方法返回 Unicode 字节顺序标记；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify whether to use the big endian byte order and whether the <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> method returns a Unicode byte order mark.
trans-unit.target: 参数指定是否使用 Big-Endian 字节顺序以及 <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> 方法是否返回 Unicode 字节顺序标记。

trans-unit.source: This constructor creates an instance that does not throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数创建时检测到无效的编码，则不引发异常的实例。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, you should enable error detection by calling the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructor and setting its `throwOnInvalidBytes` argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，应启用错误检测，通过调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数，并设置其`throwOnInvalidBytes`参数`true`。

trans-unit.source: The `byteOrderMark` parameter controls the operation of the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `byteOrderMark`参数控制的操作<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the method returns a byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark (BOM) in UTF-16 format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，该方法返回一个字节数组，包含格式 utf-16 Unicode 字节顺序标记 (BOM)。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, it returns a zero-length byte array.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，它将返回一个零长度的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: However, setting `byteOrderMark` to `true` does not cause the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method to prefix the BOM at the beginning of the byte array, nor does it cause the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method to include the number of bytes in the BOM in the byte count.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将设置`byteOrderMark`到`true`不会导致<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法的前缀开头的字节数组，BOM 也不会<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法中的物料清单中的字节计数中包括的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> instance specifying whether to support little endian or big endian byte ordering and the Unicode byte order mark.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个新<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>指定是否支持 little endian 或 big endian 字节顺序的实例和 Unicode 字节顺序标记。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to use the big endian byte order (most significant byte first); <see langword="false" /> to use the little endian byte order (least significant byte first).
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则使用 Big-Endian 字节顺序（从最高有效字节开始）；如果为 <see langword="false" />，则使用 Little-Endian 字节顺序（从最低有效字节开始）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that the <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> method returns a Unicode byte order mark; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则指定 <see cref="M:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble" /> 方法返回 Unicode 字节顺序标记；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to specify that an exception should be thrown when an invalid encoding is detected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果为 <see langword="true" />，则指定在检测到无效的编码时应当引发异常；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Parameters specify whether to use the big endian byte order, whether to provide a Unicode byte order mark, and whether to throw an exception when an invalid encoding is detected.
trans-unit.target: 参数指定是否使用 Big-Endian 字节顺序、是否提供 Unicode 字节顺序标记以及当检测到无效编码时是否引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The `byteOrderMark` parameter controls the operation of the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: `byteOrderMark`参数控制的操作<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the method returns a byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark (BOM) in UTF-16 format.
trans-unit.target: 如果`true`，该方法返回一个字节数组，包含格式 utf-16 Unicode 字节顺序标记 (BOM)。

trans-unit.source: If `false`, it returns a zero-length byte array.
trans-unit.target: 如果`false`，它将返回一个零长度的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: However, setting `byteOrderMark` to `true` does not cause the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method to prefix the BOM at the beginning of the byte array, nor does it cause the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method to include the number of bytes in the BOM in the byte count.
trans-unit.target: 但是，将设置`byteOrderMark`到`true`不会导致<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法的前缀开头的字节数组，BOM 也不会<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法中的物料清单中的字节计数中包括的字节数。

trans-unit.source: If the `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter is `true`, a method that detects an invalid byte sequence throws <xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`throwOnInvalidBytes`参数是`true`，检测到无效的字节序列的方法引发<xref:System.ArgumentException?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the method does not throw an exception, and the invalid sequence is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 否则为该方法不会引发异常，并忽略无效的序列。

trans-unit.source: For security reasons, your applications are recommended to use this constructor to create an instance of the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> class and turn on error detection by setting `throwOnInvalidBytes` to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 出于安全原因，你的应用程序建议使用此构造函数创建的实例<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>类，并通过设置打开错误检测`throwOnInvalidBytes`到`true`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the behavior of <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>, both with error detection enabled and without.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的行为<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>，同时使用启用的错误检测和不带。

trans-unit.source: Represents the Unicode character size in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Unicode 字符大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of this field is a 32-bit signed constant with a value of 2.
trans-unit.target: 此字段的值为 32 位有符号的常量值为 2。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to return the value of <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.CharSize> and display it.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何返回的值<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.CharSize>并将其显示。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Object" /> 是否等于当前的 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="value" /> is an instance of <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> and is equal to the current object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="value" /> 是 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 的一个实例并且等于当前对象，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则，为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Two <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> objects are considered equal if all of the following conditions are true:
trans-unit.target: 两个<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象可视为相等，如果满足所有以下条件：

trans-unit.source: Both objects use the same byte order (little-endian or big-endian).
trans-unit.target: 这两个对象都使用相同的字节顺序 （little-endian 或 big-endian）。

trans-unit.source: Both objects provide the byte order mark, or both do not.
trans-unit.target: 这两个对象提供的字节顺序标记，或都不。

trans-unit.source: Both objects use the same encoder fallback.
trans-unit.target: 这两个对象都使用相同的编码器回退。

trans-unit.source: Both objects use the same decoder fallback.
trans-unit.target: 这两个对象都使用相同的解码器回退。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.Equals%2A> method to test whether the current <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object is equal to a different <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.Equals%2A>方法来测试是否当前<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象是否等于不同<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象。

trans-unit.source: Five <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> objects are created and compared, and the results of the comparisons are displayed.
trans-unit.target: 五个<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>以及创建和相比，对象显示的比较结果。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the number of bytes produced by encoding a set of characters.
trans-unit.target: 计算对一组字符进行编码时产生的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the set of characters to encode.
trans-unit.target: 包含要编码的字符集的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the number of bytes produced by encoding the characters in the specified string.
trans-unit.target: 计算对指定字符串中的字符进行编码时所产生的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes produced by encoding the specified characters.
trans-unit.target: 对指定字符进行编码后生成的字节数。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the exact array size required by <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> to store the resulting bytes, you call the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算所需的精确数组大小<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>来存储所产生的字节，应调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the maximum array size, you call the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算的最大数组大小，请调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method generally allocates less memory, while the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method generally executes faster.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法通常会分配较少的内存，而<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法通常执行得更快。

trans-unit.source: With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw a <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误检测的无效的序列将导致此方法会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 错误检测，将忽略无效的序列，而无需不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly when they are saved as a file or as a stream, you can prefix a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保正确解码编码的字节它们保存为一个文件或流的形式时，可以前缀带前导码的已编码字节的流。

trans-unit.source: Inserting the preamble at the beginning of a byte stream (such as at the beginning of a series of bytes to be written to a file) is the developer's responsibility, and the number of bytes in the preamble is not reflected in the value returned by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 字节流的开头插入该前导码 (如开头的一系列字节写入到文件) 是开发人员的责任，并在该前导码的字节数不会反映在返回的值<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.String%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> and <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.String%29> methods to calculate the maximum and actual number of bytes required to encode a string.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.String%29>方法来计算最大和实际的字符串进行编码所需的字节数。

trans-unit.source: It also displays the actual number of bytes required to store a byte stream with a byte order mark.
trans-unit.target: 它还显示的实际存储字节顺序标记的字节流所需的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The following example populates an array with a Latin uppercase and lowercase characters and calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to determine the number of bytes needed to encode the Latin lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例填充数组与一个拉丁语大写和小写字符和调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法来确定需要拉丁文小写字符进行编码的字节数。

trans-unit.source: It then displays this information along with the total number of bytes needed if a byte order mark is added.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示此信息，以及所需如果添加字节顺序标记的字节总数。

trans-unit.source: It compares this number with the value returned by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method, which indicates maximum number of bytes needed to encode the Latin lowercase characters.
trans-unit.target: 它将此数字与返回的值进行比较<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法，表示所需拉丁文小写字符进行编码的字节的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: The following example populates an array with a combination of Greek and Cyrillic characters and calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to determine the number of bytes needed to encode the Cyrillic characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用来填充数组希腊语和西里尔文字符和调用的组合<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%28System.Char%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法来确定需要西里尔文的字符进行编码的字节数。

trans-unit.source: It then displays this information along with the total number of bytes needed if a byte order mark is added.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它显示此信息，以及所需如果添加字节顺序标记的字节总数。

trans-unit.source: It compares this number with the value returned by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method, which indicates maximum number of bytes needed to encode the Cyrillic characters.
trans-unit.target: 它将此数字与返回的值进行比较<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法，表示所需西里尔文的字符进行编码的字节的最大数目。

trans-unit.source: Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks.
trans-unit.target: 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the <xref:System.Text.Decoder> or the <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object provided by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> or the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，或如果的数据量太大，因此需要划分为较小的块，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.Decoder>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder>提供对象<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: Inserting the preamble at the beginning of a byte stream (such as at the beginning of a series of bytes to be written to a file) is the developer's responsibility.

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法不预置编码字节的序列的开头到前导码。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要编码的字符的数目。

trans-unit.source: The byte array to contain the resulting sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 要包含所产生的字节序列的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The index at which to start writing the resulting sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 要开始写入所产生的字节序列的索引位置。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a set of characters from the specified character array into the specified byte array.
trans-unit.target: 将指定字符数组中的一组字符编码到指定的字节数组中。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of bytes written into <paramref name="bytes" />.
trans-unit.target: 写入 <paramref name="bytes" /> 的实际字节数。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the exact array size required by <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> to store the resulting bytes, you call the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算所需的精确数组大小<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>来存储所产生的字节，应调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the maximum array size, you call the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算的最大数组大小，请调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method generally allocates less memory, while the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method generally executes faster.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法通常会分配较少的内存，而<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法通常执行得更快。

trans-unit.source: With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw a <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误检测的无效的序列将导致此方法会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 错误检测，将忽略无效的序列，而无需不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks.
trans-unit.target: 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the <xref:System.Text.Decoder> or the <xref:System.Text.Encoder> provided by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> method or the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，或如果的数据量太大，因此需要划分为较小的块，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.Decoder>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder>由<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>方法或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly when they are saved as a file or as a stream, you can prefix a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保正确解码编码的字节它们保存为一个文件或流的形式时，可以前缀带前导码的已编码字节的流。

trans-unit.source: Inserting the preamble at the beginning of a byte stream (such as at the beginning of a series of bytes to be written to a file) is the developer's responsibility.
trans-unit.target: 字节流的开头插入该前导码 (如开头的一系列字节写入到文件) 是开发人员的责任。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method does not prepend a preamble to the beginning of a sequence of encoded bytes.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法不预置编码字节的序列的开头到前导码。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算的最大数组大小，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A> method generally allocates less memory, while the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> method generally executes faster.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>方法通常会分配较少的内存，而<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>方法通常执行得更快。

trans-unit.source: With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw a <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误检测的无效的序列将导致此方法会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 错误检测，将忽略无效的序列，而无需不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the range of bytes to be decoded includes the byte order mark (BOM) and the byte array was returned by a method of a non-BOM aware type, the character U+FFFE is included in the character array returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果要解码的字节范围包含字节顺序标记 (BOM)，并且非 BOM 感知类型的方法返回的字节数组，通过此方法返回的字符数组中包含的字符 U + FFFE。

trans-unit.source: You can remove it by calling the <xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用对其进行删除<xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks.
trans-unit.target: 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the <xref:System.Text.Decoder> or the <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object provided by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> or the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，或如果的数据量太大，因此需要划分为较小的块，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.Decoder>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder>提供对象<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，或如果的数据量太大，因此需要划分为较小的块，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.Decoder>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder>由<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>方法或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: Obtains a decoder that converts a UTF-16 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 获取可以将 UTF-16 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列的解码器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Text.Decoder" /> that converts a UTF-16 encoded sequence of bytes into a sequence of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Text.Decoder" />，用于将 UTF-16 编码的字节序列转换为 Unicode 字符序列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Decoder.GetChars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method converts sequential blocks of bytes into sequential blocks of characters, in a manner similar to the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Decoder.GetChars%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将连续的字节块转换为连续的块中的字符，方式类似于<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>。

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Text.Decoder> maintains state information between calls so it can correctly decode byte sequences that span blocks.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Text.Decoder>因此它可以正确地对跨块的字节序列进行解码的调用之间维护状态信息。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Decoder> also preserves trailing bytes at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing bytes in the next decoding operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Decoder>还会保留在数据块的末尾的尾随字节，在下一步的解码操作中使用的尾随字节。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> and <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>在网络传输和文件操作很有用，因为这些操作通常处理的数据而不是完整的数据流块。

trans-unit.source: If error detection is enabled, that is, the `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter of the constructor is set to `true`, error detection is also enabled in the <xref:System.Text.Decoder> returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了错误检测，即`throwOnInvalidBytes`构造函数的参数设置为`true`，在启用了错误检测<xref:System.Text.Decoder>此方法返回。

trans-unit.source: If error detection is enabled and an invalid sequence is encountered, the state of the decoder is undefined and processing must stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了错误检测，遇到一个无效的序列的解码器状态为未定义，必须停止处理。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an encoder and a decoder to encode a string into an array of bytes, and then decode the bytes into an array of characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用了编码器和解码器转换为字节数组编码字符串，然后将字节解码为字符数组。

trans-unit.source: Obtains an encoder that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-16 encoded sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 获取可将 Unicode 字符序列转换为 UTF-16 编码的字节序列的编码器。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoder" /> object that converts a sequence of Unicode characters into a UTF-16 encoded sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 将 Unicode 字符序列转换为 UTF-16 编码字节序列的 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encoder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoder.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method converts sequential blocks of characters into sequential blocks of bytes in a manner similar to the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method of this class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoder.GetBytes%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法将连续的字符块转换为连续的方式类似于字节块<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>此类的方法。

trans-unit.source: However, a <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object maintains state information between calls so that it can correctly encode character sequences that span blocks.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Text.Encoder>对象会维护调用之间的状态信息，以便其可以进行正确编码跨块的字符序列。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object also preserves trailing characters at the end of data blocks and uses the trailing characters in the next encoding operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.Encoder>对象也会保留在数据块的末尾的尾随字符，在下一步的编码操作中使用的尾随字符。

trans-unit.source: For example, a data block might end with an unmatched high surrogate, and the matching low surrogate might be in the next data block.
trans-unit.target: 例如，一个数据块可能结尾不匹配的高代理项，并且匹配的低代理项可能在下一个数据块中。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> and <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> are useful for network transmission and file operations, because those operations often deal with blocks of data instead of a complete data stream.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>和<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>在网络传输和文件操作很有用，因为这些操作通常处理的数据而不是完整的数据流块。

trans-unit.source: If error detection is enabled, that is, the `throwOnInvalidBytes` parameter of the constructor is set to `true`, error detection is also enabled in the <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了错误检测，即`throwOnInvalidBytes`构造函数的参数设置为`true`，在启用了错误检测<xref:System.Text.Encoder>此方法返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: If error detection is enabled and an invalid sequence is encountered, the state of the encoder is undefined and processing must stop.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用了错误检测，并且遇到无效的序列，则编码器的状态为未定义，必须停止处理。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses an encoder and a decoder to encode a string into an array of bytes, and then decode the bytes into an array of characters.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用了编码器和解码器转换为字节数组编码字符串，然后将字节解码为字符数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to encode.
trans-unit.target: 要编码的字符的数目。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 计算对指定数目的字符进行编码时产生的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes produced by encoding the specified number of characters.
trans-unit.target: 对指定数目的字符进行编码所产生的最大字节数。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the exact array size required by <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> to store the resulting bytes, the application uses <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算所需的精确数组大小<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>为了存储所产生的字节，应用程序使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算的最大数组大小，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method generally allocates less memory, while the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> method generally executes faster.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法通常会分配较少的内存，而<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法通常执行得更快。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> retrieves a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected <xref:System.Text.EncoderFallback>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> 检索最坏情况的数字，包括当前所选最坏情况下<xref:System.Text.EncoderFallback>。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> can return large values.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可能很大的字符串中，选择了回退<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>可以返回较大的值。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, this method retrieves reasonable numbers for small strings.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，此方法检索用于小字符串合理的数字。

trans-unit.source: For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 对于大字符串，你可能必须使用非常大的缓冲区和超出的更合理的缓冲区的罕见情况捕捉错误之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to consider a different approach using <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> or <xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还需要考虑不同的方法使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder.Convert%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> has no relation to <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A> 与无关<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If your application needs a similar function to use with <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>, it should use <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序需要一个用于与的类似函数<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>，应使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `GetMaxByteCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`.
trans-unit.target: `GetMaxByteCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxByteCount(1)`。

trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>方法返回的最大指定的数目的字符进行编码所需的字节数。

trans-unit.target: 计算对指定数目的字节进行解码时产生的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of characters produced by decoding the specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 对指定数目的字节进行解码时所产生的最大字符数。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the exact array size required by <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A> to store the resulting characters, the application uses <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算所需的精确数组大小<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetChars%2A>来存储所产生的字符，该应用程序使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: To calculate the maximum array size, the application should use <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要计算的最大数组大小，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A> method generally allocates less memory, while the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> method generally executes faster.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>方法通常会分配较少的内存，而<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>方法通常执行得更快。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> retrieves a worst-case number, including the worst case for the currently selected <xref:System.Text.DecoderFallback>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> 检索最坏情况的数字，包括当前所选最坏情况下<xref:System.Text.DecoderFallback>。

trans-unit.source: If a fallback is chosen with a potentially large string, <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> retrieves large values.
trans-unit.target: 如果有可能很大的字符串中，选择了回退<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>检索较大的值。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, this method retrieves reasonable numbers for small strings.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数情况下，此方法检索用于小字符串合理的数字。

trans-unit.source: For large strings, you might have to choose between using very large buffers and catching errors in the rare case that a more reasonable buffer is exceeded.
trans-unit.target: 对于大字符串，你可能必须使用非常大的缓冲区和超出的更合理的缓冲区的罕见情况捕捉错误之间进行选择。

trans-unit.source: You might also want to consider a different approach using <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A> or <xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你可能还需要考虑不同的方法使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetCharCount%2A>或<xref:System.Text.Decoder.Convert%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> has no relation to <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> 与无关<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>。

trans-unit.source: If your application needs a similar function to use with <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>, it should use <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序需要一个用于与的类似函数<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>，应使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxByteCount%2A>。

trans-unit.source: `GetMaxCharCount(N)` is not necessarily the same value as `N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`.
trans-unit.target: `GetMaxCharCount(N)` 不一定是相同的值`N* GetMaxCharCount(1)`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A> method to return the maximum number of characters produced by decoding a specified number of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetMaxCharCount%2A>方法返回的最大字符数生成对指定的数目的字节进行解码。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="byteCount" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="byteCount" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The resulting number of bytes is greater than the maximum number that can be returned as an integer.
trans-unit.target: 得到的字节数大于可作为整数返回的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: A fallback occurred (see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) for fuller explanation)
trans-unit.target: 发生了回退（有关更完整的说明，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)）

trans-unit.source: -and-
<see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.DecoderFallback" /> is set to <see cref="T:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallback" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.DecoderFallback" /> 设置为 <see cref="T:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallback" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a Unicode byte order mark encoded in UTF-16 format, if the constructor for this instance requests a byte order mark.
trans-unit.target: 如果此实例的构造函数请求一个字节顺序标记，则将返回用 UTF-16 格式编码的 Unicode 字节顺序标记。

trans-unit.source: A byte array containing the Unicode byte order mark, if the <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> object is configured to supply one.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含 Unicode 字节顺序标记的字节数组（如果 <see cref="T:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding" /> 对象配置为提供一个这样的字节数组）。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns a zero-length byte array.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此方法返回一个零长度的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object can provide a preamble, which is a byte array that can be prefixed to the sequence of bytes resulting from the encoding process.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象可以提供一个前导码，即可以前缀的编码的过程中所产生的字节序列的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: Prefacing a sequence of encoded bytes with a byte order mark (code point U+FEFF) helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format or UTF.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节顺序标记 (码位为 U + feff) 使用的编码字节序列的可帮助确定的字节顺序和转换格式或 UTF 解码器。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode byte order mark (BOM) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal):
trans-unit.target: Unicode 字节顺序标记 (BOM) （以十六进制格式），如下所示序列：

trans-unit.source: Big endian byte order: FE FF
trans-unit.target: Big endian 字节顺序： FE FF

trans-unit.source: Little endian byte order: FF FE
trans-unit.target: Little-endian 字节顺序： FF FE

trans-unit.source: You can instantiate a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object whose <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method returns a valid BOM in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 可以实例化<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象，其<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法返回有效 BOM 通过以下方式：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object returned by the <xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Text.Encoding.BigEndianUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>返回对象<xref:System.Text.Encoding.Unicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Text.Encoding.BigEndianUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the parameterless <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor> constructor to instantiate a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> object.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用的无参数<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor>构造函数实例化<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象。

trans-unit.source: By supplying `true` as the value of the `byteOrderMark` argument to the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> or <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29> constructors.
trans-unit.target: 通过提供`true`的值作为`byteOrderMark`参数<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%2CSystem.Boolean%29>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: We recommended that you use the BOM, since it provides nearly certain identification of an encoding for files that otherwise have lost a reference to their encoding, such as untagged or improperly tagged web data or random text files stored when a business did not have international concerns.
trans-unit.target: 我们建议你使用 BOM，因为它提供近乎确定标识到其编码，如无标记或标记错误，否则就已失去引用的文件的编码的 web 数据或存储时的业务的随机文本文件没有国际问题。

trans-unit.source: Often user problems might be avoided if data is consistently and properly tagged.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据一致且正确的标记，则可能会避免通常用户问题。

trans-unit.source: For standards that provide an encoding type, a BOM is somewhat redundant.
trans-unit.target: 提供编码类型的标准，BOM 是某种程度上冗余的。

trans-unit.source: However, it can be used to help a server send the correct encoding header.
trans-unit.target: 但是，它可以用于帮助发送正确的编码标头的服务器。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, it can be used as a fallback in case the encoding is otherwise lost.
trans-unit.target: 或者，它可作为回退以防的编码否则将丢失。

trans-unit.source: There are some disadvantages to using a BOM.
trans-unit.target: 有使用 BOM 一些缺点。

trans-unit.source: For example, knowing how to limit the database fields that use a BOM can be difficult.
trans-unit.target: 例如，知道如何限制使用 BOM 的数据库字段可以很困难。

trans-unit.source: Concatenation of files can be a problem also, for example, when files are merged in such a way that an unnecessary character can end up in the middle of data.
trans-unit.target: 串联的文件可以也是个问题，例如，这合并文件时不必要的字符可以得到中间数据的方式。

trans-unit.source: In spite of the few disadvantages, however, the use of a BOM is highly recommended.
trans-unit.target: 但是，而不考虑几个缺点下, 强烈建议使用 BOM。

trans-unit.source: To ensure that the encoded bytes are decoded properly, you should prefix the beginning of a stream of encoded bytes with a preamble.
trans-unit.target: 若要确保正确解码已编码的字节，应前缀带前导码的已编码字节的流的开始位置。

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A> method does not prepend a BOM to a sequence of encoded bytes; supplying a BOM at the beginning of an appropriate byte stream is the developer's responsibility.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetBytes%2A>方法不预置到编码字节的序列 BOM; 提供的相应字节流的开头 BOM 是开发人员的责任。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method to retrieve the Unicode byte order mark in big endian or little endian byte order for an instance of a <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法来检索 big-endian 或 little-endian 字节顺序的实例中的 Unicode 字节顺序标记<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates two <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding> objects, the first of which does not provide a BOM, and the second of which does.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化两个<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding>对象，其中第一个不提供 BOM，并且第二个的不会。

trans-unit.source: It then calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method to write the BOM to a file before writing a Unicode-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: 然后，它调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法以在编写使用 Unicode 编码的字符串之前，向文件写入 BOM。

trans-unit.source: As the console output from the example shows, the file that saves the bytes from the second encoder has three more bytes than the first.
trans-unit.target: 如控制台输出示例中所示，从第二个编码器将字节的文件将具有三个更多字节比第一个。

trans-unit.source: You can also compare the files by using the `fc` command in a console window, or you can inspect the files in a text editor that includes a Hex View mode.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以通过使用比较文件`fc`命令控制台窗口中，或者您可以检查包括十六进制视图模式的文本编辑器中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Note that when the file is opened in an editor that supports UTF-16 encoding, the BOM is not displayed.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果在支持 utf-16 编码的编辑器中打开该文件，将不显示 BOM。

trans-unit.source: The byte array containing the sequence of bytes to decode.
trans-unit.target: 包含要解码的字节序列的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The index of the first byte to decode.
trans-unit.target: 第一个要解码的字节的索引。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to decode.
trans-unit.target: 要解码的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a range of bytes from a byte array into a string.
trans-unit.target: 将字节数组中某个范围的字节解码为一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> object containing the results of decoding the specified sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 包含指定字节序列解码结果的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: With error detection, an invalid sequence causes this method to throw a <xref:System.ArgumentException>.
trans-unit.target: 使用错误检测的无效的序列将导致此方法会引发<xref:System.ArgumentException>。

trans-unit.source: Without error detection, invalid sequences are ignored, and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 错误检测，将忽略无效的序列，而无需不引发异常。

trans-unit.source: If the range of bytes to be decoded includes the byte order mark (BOM) and the byte array was returned by a method of a non-BOM aware type, the character U+FFFE is included in the character array returned by this method.
trans-unit.target: 如果要解码的字节范围包含字节顺序标记 (BOM)，并且非 BOM 感知类型的方法返回的字节数组，通过此方法返回的字符数组中包含的字符 U + FFFE。

trans-unit.source: You can remove it by calling the <xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过调用对其进行删除<xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: Data to be converted, such as data read from a stream, might be available only in sequential blocks.
trans-unit.target: 数据转换，如从流中读取的数据可能仅在连续的块中可用。

trans-unit.source: In this case, or if the amount of data is so large that it needs to be divided into smaller blocks, the application should use the <xref:System.Text.Decoder> or the <xref:System.Text.Encoder> object provided by the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A> or the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A> method, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，或如果的数据量太大，因此需要划分为较小的块，应用程序应使用<xref:System.Text.Decoder>或<xref:System.Text.Encoder>提供对象<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetDecoder%2A>或<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetEncoder%2A>方法，分别。

trans-unit.source: The following example initializes an array by calling the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A> method to determine exactly how many bytes are required for an encoded string and then adding the size of the byte order mark (BOM).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例通过调用初始化数组<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetByteCount%2A>方法来确定完全字节数和所需的已编码的字符串然后添加字节顺序标记 (BOM) 的大小。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A> method to store the BOM to the array before calling the <xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A> method to store the encoded bytes to the array.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetPreamble%2A>方法以存储到之前调用数组 BOM<xref:System.Text.Encoding.GetBytes%2A>方法来存储编码的字节数组。

trans-unit.source: The example then calls the <xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetString%2A> method to decode the string.
trans-unit.target: 该示例然后调用<xref:System.Text.UnicodeEncoding.GetString%2A>方法进行解码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Note that in this case the decoded string differs from the original string, since it begins with a 16-bit byte order mark U+FFFD.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在这种情况下已解码的字符串不同于原始字符串，因为它与 16 位字节顺序标记 U + FFFD 开始。

trans-unit.source: This means that the two strings will compare as unequal, and that if the string is output, the BOM will be displayed as the replacement character "?".
trans-unit.target: 这意味着两个字符串将比较是不相等，并且，如果字符串为输出，BOM 将显示为替换字符"？"。

trans-unit.source: To remove the BOM at the beginning of the string, you can call the <xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要删除字符串的开头 BOM，可以调用<xref:System.String.TrimStart%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="bytes" /> is <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" />).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="bytes" /> 为 <see langword="null" /> (<see langword="Nothing" />)。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> and <paramref name="count" /> do not denote a valid range in <paramref name="bytes" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 不表示 <paramref name="bytes" /> 中的有效范围。

trans-unit.source: Error detection is enabled, and <paramref name="bytes" /> contains an invalid sequence of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 启用了错误检测，并且 <paramref name="bytes" /> 包含无效的字节序列。

trans-unit.source: A fallback occurred (see [Character Encoding in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md) for fuller explanation)
trans-unit.target: 发生了回退（有关更完整的说明，请参阅 [.NET Framework 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)）

trans-unit.source: -and-
<see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.DecoderFallback" /> is set to <see cref="T:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallback" />.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="P:System.Text.Encoding.DecoderFallback" /> 设置为 <see cref="T:System.Text.DecoderExceptionFallback" />。
